name: Nekonomicon (Beta)
description:
" Ready for some purr~ fect Chaos? "

After being kicked out of Magic College,  Nikki and her friend Daisy go back home to make some dinner, Nikki, after grabbing a magic "cookbook", prepares a meal and accidentally awakens the chaos of the Nekonomicon!

Seeing this as an opportunity to impress her old college professors, she sees what else she can cook up with the tome's secrets.

Nekonomicon is a cooking and summoning simulation-styled minigame compilation, with a horror comedy focus.

We are planning to make this into a complete game, but please consider this version a prototype of our planned production. We ran out of time due to unforseen circumstances so we only have one level but we hope you can see our goal!

Credits:

Phantom Hound Studios is a video game company dedicated to providing high-quality visual representation and gameplay to LGBTQ+ and POC within the gaming community
